Articles.Content:
The year is 2100. A large space station, home to 500 people, is in Earth orbit. After communications are lost, the Constellation erupts into chaos, and many die. Now the remaining inhabitants must survive, and find a way to get back to Earth.

GOAL: You are a survivor. Survive in the space station and harvest materials, while helping other players. Create a vehicle to get back to Earth.

RULES: No cheating, and have fun.

INFO: The Constellation is an O'Neill cylinder. There are 6 main areas.

1: Starleaf Forest

2: Pegasus City

3: Manufacturing District

4: Suburbs

5: The Trading Hub

6: Power Station

Each of these areas have different resources. You can probably guess what the resources are.

Events are major, well, events that occur randomly. They can range from a fire to an oxygen leak. Survivors must help eachother to fix the problem. Rogue CPF robots are also a big danger, as they can attack anyone at random.

Only ShachonianX can create major events.

TRADING RULES: One user (let's call him X) must give another user ( we'll call him Z) a certain resource, and Z must give a resource to X. Trading must only be done in the Trading Hub.

PET RULES: Pets are animals that follow you around. They can help you find resources, and hunt wild animals in areas like the Suburbs and Starleaf Forest. Only ShachonianX can decide when a pet will appear, and in what area it will appear in. If you are in the area the pet appears in, you can take it as your own. Pets can also be claimed if they start following you. You can have three pets at a time.

Have fun playing!

Edited May 19, 2013 by ShachonianX

I'll start this off.

I enter an old abandoned warehouse in the Manufacturing District, and find some fuel. It could be used to light a fire, or fuel a machine.
I run off to the medical rooms and salvage items. There seems to be a few people here but there not in the best of health.
Exiting the Manufacturing District, I find a dead body. Next to it is the person's pet dog. It starts following me, and it becomes my pet.
I have left the medical rooms and am heading to the Manufacturing District. I have found a wrench. "This my find a use at one point." I put it in my nap sack.
I head to the medical rooms and see everyone has died,I grab some medicine and other healing products and head for the Manufacturing District.
Entering the hospital, I scavenge the remaining medicine, and head to the mall. At the mall I take some food.
I go to the Manufacturing District and grab a trolley from an abandoned warehouse.
A pet has appeared in the Manufacturing District! It is a cat! Make sure to claim it before anyone else!
I get a small crate from the warehouse floor, load it onto my trolley, and allow the cat to sit in it.
UPDATE: Trading can now only be done in the Trading Hub!

I enter a small school, and apparently a few survivors are in it. They could die any minute now. I find a knife used for cutting food.

I decide to not risk it and I leave the clearing, but I keep the place in mind for later investigation.
